President Bush refused to accept both times, keeping Donald Rumsfeld on at the Pentagon, where he turned into a lightning rod for criticism of the invasion and occupation of Iraq. In an exclusive interview with ABC's Diane Sawyer , Donald Rumsfeld also said the enhanced interrogation techniques he approved for use on the so-called`` 20th hijacker - including forced stress positions and removal of`` comfort items''- produced invaluable intelligence. But his biggest regret was staying in office during what he calls a period of`` damaging distraction,''

, who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the TV show, believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. Jane Lynch Inspired By Simon Cowell For Glee Character. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is`` amazed'' by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
